tooltip.frozenlib.locked_due_to_server:
Entry cannot be modified while connected to this server.
Requires operator permissions to modify.
You can leave the server to modify this entry, and rejoin afterwards.
tooltip.frozenlib.locked_due_to_sync:
Entry is overriden by this server.
Requires operator permissions to modify.
tooltip.frozenlib.locked_due_to_server_l:
Entry cannot be modified while connected to this world.
Must be host or have operator permissions to modify.
You can leave the world to modify this entry, and rejoin afterwards.
tooltip.frozenlib.locked_due_to_sync_lan:
Entry is overriden by this world.
Must be host or have operator permissions to modify.
tooltip.frozenlib.locked_due_to_unknown_:
Entry cannot be modified for an unknown reason.
Please submit an issue report for this mod.
tooltip.frozenlib.entry_sync_notice: Entry will sync with all clients.
option.frozenlib.component.title: FrozenLib Options
tooltip.frozenlib.disabled_datafix_types:
A list of DataFix types that are excluded from running through
the modified DataFixerUpper API by The Quilt Project

Worldgen settings are disabled by default to
prevent a compatibility issue with Lithium + BCLib

The vanilla DataFix types are...
'level', 'player', 'chunk', 'hotbar', 'options', 'structure', 'stats',
'saved_data', 'advancements', 'poi_chunk', 'entity_chunk',
and 'world_gen_settings'
tooltip.frozenlib.use_wind_on_non_frozen:
When disabled, the client won't use wind on servers that
don't have FrozenLib installed.
When enabled, the client will generate a random seed to use
for wind on servers that don't have FrozenLib installed.
tooltip.frozenlib.save_item_cooldowns:
Whether or not item cooldowns will save instead of being
cleared upon switching dimensions or rejoining a world.
tooltip.frozenlib.remove_experimental_wa: Whether or not the Experimental Features warning can show on world creation.
tooltip.frozenlib.warden_spawn_tracker_c: Enables or disables the Warden Spawn Tracker command.
commands.screenshake.success: Created screen shake at %s, %s, %s, with intensity %s, duration %s, falloff start %s, and distance %s.
commands.screenshake.player.success: Sent screen shake to %sat %s, %s, %s, with intensity %s, duration %s, falloff start %s, and distance %s.
commands.screenshake.remove.player.succe: Players %shave had their screen shakes removed.
commands.screenshake.entity.success: Created screen shake appended to %swith intensity %s, duration %s, falloff start %s, and distance %s.
commands.screenshake.remove.entity.succe: Entities %shave had their screen shakes removed.
commands.screenshake.remove.entity.failu: Could not find entities with screen shakes.
commands.warden_spawn_tracker.clear.succ: Cleared warden spawn warnings from %s players
commands.warden_spawn_tracker.set.succes: Set warden spawn warning %s to %s players
frozenlib.loot_table_whacker.fail.no_nam: Loot Table Whacker has not been named!
frozenlib.core.registry_sync.require_mai: This server requires %s with protocol version of %s.
frozenlib.core.registry_sync.main_mod_pr: You are on %s with protocol version of %s.
